markdownRemark.html:
Hi Friends üëã,

Welcome To aGuideHub! ‚ù§Ô∏è

To convert int to int32 in golang, use theint32() method it will return int as a int32. You have to just call it like int32(v).

Follow the below tutorial if you are struggling with installing GO in windows.

https://aguidehub.com/blog/how-to-install-golang-in-windows

Today, I will show you how do I convert int to int32 in golang, as mentioned above I‚Äôm going to use the Itint32oa() method which is provided by the golang.

Let‚Äôs start our Golang convert int to int32 example

main.go

package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "reflect"
)

func main() {
    var n int = 97
    m := int32(n)
    fmt.Println(m)
    fmt.Println(reflect.TypeOf(m))
}

In the above example, we have converted the int value to a int32 and printed in golang console. let‚Äôs check the output.

Output

97
int32

I hope it helps you, All the best üëç.
